name: en-royalities
text:
Secondary sales royalty
revenue will share with NFT holders

name: en-investment
text:
15 % of revenue from mint sales, 1.5 % of the transaction fees,
and 1.5% of the secondary sales revenuego to the investment fund
pool. 5 % of reuenue from mint sales, 0,5 % of the transaction fees
and % 0.5 of thesecondary sales revenue go to the donationfund
pool. Selected projects will invest in from the fund.
Earnings will share with NFT holders.

name: en-lottery
text:
1% of transaction fees goes into the
prize pool. 1% royalty fee of the secondarysales
goes into the prize pool. The lucky winners will
get prizes every two weeks.

name: en-metaverse
text:
It is the next phase of the fishing game
The fish processed in the factories to be established
on the lands purchased here will be
a new income source for the players. It will add
value to the fishing game ecosystem.
(This step is a real Metaverse that supports VR technology.)

name: en-community
text:
70% of the investment fund allocated
to the community wallet
70% of the donation fund allocated to the
community wallet Ability for holders to vote for
the projects they like the most.

name: en-nfclub
text:
NFClub is a community-based investment,
charity club. NFClub has already planned 4
game projerts, 1 hybrid game project, and more
The adventure is starting with
Fishing which is one of
NFClub projects.
